overview: From 2025-01-05 to 2025-01-06, elizaos/eliza had 25 new PRs (23 merged), 12 new issues, and 62 active contributors.

completedItems.body:

Remove db caching of character card info, we instead read from character card and cache in memory directly

completedItems.title: feat: Implement a plugin that can retrieve Marlin TEE remote attestations
completedItems.body:
# Risks

Low. 

# Background

## What does this PR do?

This PR aims to add a plugin that makes Eliza verifiable through the use of TEEs. The plugin leverages the [Marlin Oyster](https://docs.marlin.org/user-guides/oyster/) platform
